title: Macquarie University Team
body: Hi all! Recently LoL OCE posted a site where university teams could form- however as of yet there's not one for Macquarie University (NSW). I was interested in making one but can't do it myself, anybody else interested in forming a team?

replies.body: Hi, Im going to MQ as well and noticed they didnt have a LOL team :( i would love to form one though
PM me in game and we can arrange a facebook chat or something (IGN is the same) :) also anyone else you may know is obviously more than welcome!
